FuncDef: The display web-auth-server configuration command displays the configuration of the web authentication server.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays memory statistics on the slave main control board.
-

Examples: User query sequence   : username  usermac  userip  useraccid
Server  Shared-key   Port  PortFlag  NAS-IP  time  State Vpn-instance
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display web-auth-server configuration command displays the configuration of the web authentication server.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
